definition: over the entire area, (cricket) the division of play during which six balls are bowled at the batsman by one player from the other team from the same end of the pitch, having come or been brought to a conclusion
details:
adverb
- over the entire area
= example: over the entire area
= synonyms: all over
- throughout a period of time
= example: throughout a period of time
= synonyms: o'er
- at or to a point across intervening space etc.
= example: at or to a point across intervening space etc.
- throughout an area
= example: throughout an area
- beyond the top or upper surface or edge
noun
- (cricket) the division of play during which six balls are bowled at the batsman by one player from the other team from the same end of the pitch
adjective
- having come or been brought to a conclusion
= synonyms: all over
